index_terms: DEPARTMENT OF HOUSING AND URBAN DEVELOPMENT
summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Department of Housing and Human Services; authorizing an agreement with the United States Department of Housing and Urban Development for additional HOME Program funds; appropriating the additional HOME Program funds; modifying the allocation plan for the 1996 HOME Program; authorizing amendment of the 1996 Consolidated Plan; and ratifying and confirming prior acts.
committee: Health, Human Services, Education and Libraries
